title: Ask NASA Climate
content:
A small part of the Antarctic ice sheet. Image credit: NASA/GRACE team/DLR/Ben Holt Sr.
“Ice sheets are not Republicans or Democrats — they don’t have a political agenda as they disappear.” Dr. Michael E. Mann, Department of Meteorology, Pennsylvania State University. Taken from this story.
This website is produced by the Earth Science Communications Team at
Site last updated: September 21, 2023
